name: The Great Brain Adventure (Canceled)
blurb: The Great Brain Adventure is a single player mobile game with puzzle, adventure and social gaming elements.

rewards.reward: $5+ Pledge \u2013 Honorary Name On Website (you also get an advanced digital copy of the game): Have your name gloriously listed on the game's official website. It\u2019s going to be framed and look totally awesome and exciting. Your friends will all wish they were as awesome as you!

$20+ Pledge - Honorary Name On Website + Game Credits (you also get an advanced digital copy of the game): Your name listed on a website is awesome on its own but this gives you legendary status as your name will be credited in the game!

$40+ Pledge - Honorary Name On Website + Game Credits (you also get an advanced digital copy of the game) + Unlocked Playable Characters + Unlimited Lives: The game has 4 playable characters but not all are unlocked. This gives you a special game code that give you access to the locked characters right away while everyone else has to wait. Oh yeah, you also get unlimited lives.

$80+ Pledge - Honorary Name On Website + Game Credits (you also get an advanced digital copy of the game) + Unlocked Playable Characters + Unlimited Lives + 50 Power Ups: The game has 6 specific power ups of high usefulness and value. In fact, they have a dollar value. 50 power ups of each kind is essentially about $275. So they are very hard to come by.

$100+ Pledge - Honorary Name On Website + Game Credits (you also get an advanced digital copy of the game) + Unlocked Playable Characters + Unlimited Lives + 50 Power Ups: You get everything listed in the $80 pledge and a game t-shirt! \u2013 Please add $15 for shipping.

$250+ Pledge \u2013 Team Benjamin Package (Boy Hero):\r\nYou get everything listed in the $80+ dollar pledge. But you also get a Team Benjamin stickers, poster and one of Benjamin\u2019s fashionable glasses! You also get a game poster, a t-shirt, a hat, and a tote bag \u2013 Please add $30 for shipping.

$250+ Pledge \u2013 Team Bastet Package (Cat Hero):\r\nYou get everything listed in the $80+ dollar pledge. But you also get a Team Bastet stickers, poster and one of Bastet\u2019s toys! You also get a game poster, a t-shirt, a hat, and a tote bag and \u2013 Please add $30 for shipping.

$250+ Pledge \u2013 Team Evil Package:\r\nYou get everything listed in the $80+ dollar pledge. But you also get a Team Evil stickers, poster and an evil paraphernalia! You also get a game poster, a t-shirt, a hat, and a tote bag \u2013 Please add $30 for shipping.

$250+ Pledge \u2013 Team Bruno Package (Dog Hero):\r\nYou get everything listed in the $80+ dollar pledge. But you also get a Team Bruno stickers, poster and one of Bruno\u2019s toys! You also get a game poster, a t-shirt, a hat, and a tote bag \u2013 Please add $30 for shipping.

$250+ Pledge \u2013 Team Blossom Package (Girl Hero):\r\nYou get everything listed in the $80+ dollar pledge. But you also get a Team Blossom stickers, poster and one of Blossom\u2019s scrunchies! You also get a game poster, a t-shirt, a hat, and a tote bag \u2013 Please add $30 for shipping.

$500+ Pledge - Honorary Name On Website + Game Credits + Unlocked Playable Characters + Unlimited Lives + Unlimited Power Ups: This pledges give you the developer\u2019s version of the game. The only people who will have this copy is me, my programmers and 20 individuals who commit to this pledge. (BONUS: You\u2019ll get 1 game poster with your name on it crediting you as a valued backer and 1 set of game stickers. 2 t-shirts, 2 hats and 2 tote bags are also included) \u2013 Please add $30 for shipping.

$1500+ Pledge \u2013 Male Villain Package:\r\nYou get everything listed in the $500+ dollar pledge. You also get to be named after one of the 14 male villains of the game. Seriously, anyone playing the game will see that one of the bad guys is you! Basically, your package will contain Team Evil sticker sheets x2, Team Evil poster x2 and an evil paraphernalia x2. You will also get a game poster x2, a poster of your character x2, t-shirts x2, hats x2, and tote bags x2! \u2013 Please add $35 for shipping.

$1500+ Pledge \u2013 Female Villain Package:\r\nYou get everything listed in the $500+ dollar pledge. You also get to be named after one of the 7 Female villains of the game. For real, one of the feisty mean girls of the game could be you! Basically, your package will contain Team Evil sticker sheets x2, Team Evil poster x2 and an evil paraphernalia x2. You will also get a game poster x2, a poster of your character x2, t-shirts x2, 2 hats, and tote bags x2! \u2013 Please add $35 for shipping.

$3000+ Pledge \u2013 Main Boss Package:\r\nIt does not get any better than this. We will name the game's main villain after one person. Just imagine\u2026 Star Wars has Darth Vader; Lord of the Rings has Sauron; The Matrix has Agent Smith. The Great Brain Adventure has\u2026 YOU! This is your chance to reach epic villainous fame! You will also get everything listed in the $500+ dollar pledge. So your package will basically have Team Evil stickers, Team Bruno stickers, Team Blossom Stickers, Team Bastet stickers, Team Benjamin stickers, Team Evil poster, Team Bruno poster, Team Blossom poster, Team Bastet poster, Team Benjamin poster, 2x game posters, 2x posters of your character, 2x t-shirts, 2x hats, 2x tote bags, 1x Team Evil paraphernalia, 1x Benjamin\u2019s sunglasses, 1x Blossom\u2019s scrunchy, 1x Bruno\u2019s toy, and 1x Bastet\u2019s toy! Lastly, you will also get Benjamin Brain\u2019s backpack! \u2013 Please add $40 for shipping.
